Function reference

All functions

check_code()
Check id of documents
disposicion_cve() disposicion() anuncio_cve() anuncio()
Elements: disposición and anuncio
get_xml()
Retrieve the XML content
open_publications()
Open publications on the browser
query_consolidada()
Build a query for the webpage
query_htm()
Build a query for the webpage
query_pdf()
Query a pdf from the BOE
query_xml()
Build a query for an XML
retrieve_document()
Retrieve information of a publication
retrieve_sumario()
Retrieve the sumario
sumario_cve()
Create the number of the sumario
sumario_nbo() sumario_xml()
Create the number for sumario
tidy_sumario()
Tidy sumario from xml file
url_publications()
Url to the publications

About BOE

Developed by Lluís Revilla Sancho.

Part of the rOpenSpain project.

About rOpenSpain

rOpenSpain is a community of R enthusiasts whose ultimate goal is to create high-quality R packages for data mining public Spanish open sources.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.2.

Template rostemplate by dieghernan, based on Bootstrapious.
